explanation: [0-0] In a room, a long-haired girl in a long white dress is standing with a pair of pure white wings on her back. Her arms are crossed in front of her chest, her eyes are closed, and her face is turned to the right.

[0-4] First, the girl in the white dress opens her eyes and takes a few steps forward. She then opens her arms, places them on either side of her body, opens her mouth wide, widens her eyes, and looks to the left. The scene changes to a man with vampire makeup. He is wearing a white suit jacket and a red shirt, revealing sharp teeth. His hands are open and raised in front of him as he turns his head.
